messages: We've got a new member! Welcome [MEMBER]!
[MEMBER] is to be welcomed to the server!
Don't worry, [MEMBER] is here to help us out!
A friend has joined the party! [MEMBER] get yourself a drink!
[MEMBER] made it just in time, nice!
A green bean has joined, be nice to [MEMBER] everyone!
[MEMBER] is here to answer all of our questions, right?
Did you arrive by chopper, plane or hovercraft, [MEMBER]?
Look who is here! [MEMBER] is ready for all the fun!
[MEMBER] has fallen and will be remembered...
Rest in peace, [MEMBER]. You won't be forgotten.
I can't believe you've done this [MEMBER]...
Don't worry [MEMBER], I don't hate you but you leaving us does hurt.
